landing.title: Your links, organized
landing.description: Blink is the ultimate workspace to store, manage, and collaborate on links with your team. Secure, fast, and beautifully designed.

hero.title: Your Links,
hero.subtitle: The ultimate workspace to store, manage, and collaborate on links with your team. Secure, fast, and beautifully designed.

containers.title: Centralized Containers
containers.desc: Create dedicated workspaces called "Containers" for different projects, teams, or personal interests. Keep your links customized and organized in one secure place.

sharing.title: Easy Sharing
sharing.desc: Share your collections with the world or specific people. Manage permissions, elevate or revoke them when necessary.

invitations.title: Incoming Invitations
invitations.desc: Manage requests to join other workspaces. Review, accept, or decline incoming invitations to collaborate on and help manage shared containers.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your account preferences and settings
settings.themeDesc: Choose between a light or dark theme.
settings.languageDesc: Set your preferred language for the app.
settings.importDesc: Import bookmarks from your browser or other services (HTML file).
settings.exportDesc: Export all your containers and links to an HTML file (Netscape format).

emptyPersonal.title: No personal containers yet
emptyPersonal.desc: Create your first container to start organizing your links and resources.
emptyPersonal.searchDesc: Try adjusting your search terms or create a new container.

emptyShared.title: No shared containers yet
emptyShared.desc: Containers shared with you will appear here.

login.title: Log In
login.subtitle: Log in to your Blink account to access your links.

signup.title: Create Account
signup.subtitle: Join Blink to organize and share your links with ease.
signup.subheader: Join us to organize your links

errors.loginFailed: Failed to log in. Please check your credentials.
errors.acceptTerms: You must accept the Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy
errors.passwordLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
errors.emailInUse: This email is already registered. Please try logging in instead.
errors.weakPassword: Password should be at least 6 characters long.
errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
errors.operationNotAllowed: Email/password accounts are not enabled. Please contact support.

verification.title: Account created!
verification.message: A verification email has been sent. Please check your inbox.

vault.description: Browse links in the {{name}} container on Blink.
vault.empty: No links yet. Click "Add Link" to get started.

deleteLink.title: Delete Link
deleteLink.message: Are you sure you want to delete "{{title}}"? This action cannot be undone.

deleteVault.title: Delete Vault
deleteVault.message: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? All links will be permanently deleted.
